answerText: Babbitt[10] This author of Babbitt described Carol Kennicott's life in Gopher Prairie, Minnesota, in Main Street.

subject: Literature
question: Question:  In this novel, the title character is married to Myra and has an affair with Tanis Judique.  [10] Name this 1922 satire of middle-class conformity.
